overview:
Dan Gudema is the co-founder of Take It National, a provider of Saas Franchise software, which can manage your national presence for events, seminars, parties, franchises, local concepts, product distribution and other national networks.

Dan Gudema is considered an expert in Web Analytics and has worked as a web programmer, web manager, marketing manager, e-commerce analyst and has worked for several high volume web based transactions businesses.

Dan Gudema was the co-founder of Pre-Dating.com, a successful speed dating business, which was sold to Cupid.com in 2004.

In 2006, Dan received an MBA in eCommerce from Florida Atlantic University in Boca Raton, FL. In 2004, Dan won the FAU Business Plan Contest with a concept of developing personality profiles as visitors surf the web. Dan also has an issued patent and works on perfectingly his blog entries about web business models at http://www.strategicpoints.com/blog/.
